text: What did I do wrongTonight my wife of   years attempted Suicide  This did not feel like her usual cry for help  We recently experienced a miscarriage after a rough cycle of IVF  Narcotics And alcohol have never been her go to  She texted her dad and he called the police to come and check on her just about   mins after I got home from a   hr shift  They were cordial and sympathetic and called a grief counselor for her to talk with as she lay on our bed room floor   I feel so lost  It s never escalated to this level in such a long time  I have so many emotions pent up right now  So broken and angry and powerless to do anything about it all  She was on the verge of being taken away but she knows what to say to the counselor to end that conversation  I almost hoped he wouldn t have fallen for that   That this time I wouldn t be in charge of this runaway train careening into the night breaking things emotionally and physically all around me  I feel alone and unable to process what my purpose in the life we share anymore   The role of the caretaker is what I do for a living and to have that role forced upon me at home is unbelievable and so personal   I can barely breath around this home we share   She no longer wants to suffer anymore  And that the loss of her life is not up to me  her family  her friends  But a choice she wants to make all on her own   I get that  I see patients go through loss of life and limb on a daily basis  Some chose to fight no more after terminal illness is presented upon them  But she sees her depression  anxieties  fears  pain all the same as a cancer   And I understand that   She says it s selfish of us to want her to stay around and be in our lives  But at what cost is it to us  What am I supposed to do when she does final succeed  How am I suppose to move on and carry the struggles alone    Every day I feel like I made a mistake   yrs ago  And every day I am paying that price with my livelihood  sanity  finances  relationships and wellbeing  When will I every be ok
summary: Tonight my wife of years attempted suicide. She had recently experienced a miscarriage after a rough cycle of IVF Narcotics and alcohol have never been her go to. She texted her dad and he called the police to come and check on her. He called a grief counselor for her to talk with as she lay on the bed room floor. She was on the verge of being taken away but she knows what to say to the counselor to end the conversation. She no longer wants to suffer anymore.
cleaned: tonight wife year attempt suicide recently experience miscarriage rough cycle narcotic alcohol texte dad call police come check call grief counselor talk lie bed room floor verge take away know counselor end conversation no long want suffer anymore

text: I think I m failing college and I m lost  lost in life What it says in the title  The thing is  I m getting there  slowly  Very  very slowly  but I can feel myself getting there  I don t sleep   hours a day  I ve fixed my sleeping schedule  I m eating regular meals and pushing myself to get things done  which is a lot better than I was even a few months ago  and it s taken all my energy to even get up to this level  But everyone around me is screaming to pick up the pace if I want to keep my head above the water  or I m going to end up belly up I m at a fairly good uni  my parents broke their backs getting me here and me dropping out would quite possibly literally kill them  so it s not an option  The workload is pretty hard  though  and I m having lots of trouble keeping up because of my mental illnesses  I have clinical depression  anxiety disorders and undiagnosed ADD  but I HAVE to keep up or else I ll kill myself  More than anything else  I m terrified of making a fool of myself  but I already have  many times  I thought that would be motivation enough  at first  to keep me going and not slip under  but I ve slipped under much faster than I would have liked and I feel like I m drowning  What s more  I feel hollow inside and I don t know what I want to do after uni anyway  I want to die  I have no hobbies except going on the internet all day  every day  I m a disgusting bum and I know it but I can find no escape other than just dying edit  just wanted to add more points  i feel like my whole life has been led by my parents so far  do you think that if i kill myself tonight  they might recognize that something went wrong with me  not trying to be vengeful  i just want to break this cycle
summary: I think I'm failing college and I'm lost lost in life. My parents broke their backs to get me to this university. My workload is hard because of my mental illnesses. I have clinical depression anxiety disorders and undiagnosed ADD.
cleaned: think fail college lose lose life parent break back university workload hard mental illness clinical depression anxiety disorder undiagnosed add

text: Do you find any value in mental health services You call and the earliest they can see you is five weeks from now  You wait those five weeks like a champ and your therapist doesn t connect at all  or just doesn t care  Wait anywhere from four to eight weeks to see that person again  or another five week wait to switch to a new person  if available  Even if you finally find a good therapist  the turnover is ridiculous  and soon enough you get an e mail telling you that your therapist has left and that you have to start over again That s not even getting to the medical side of  treating  depression  which is the equivalent of trying to solve a computer problem by randomly mashing different combinations of keys and hoping  somehow  that it works   And hell  that s if you HAVE health insurance   Am I just unlucky here  Is this what everyone goes through
summary: Mental health services are very time consuming and difficult to find. It can take up to 8 weeks to see the same therapist twice and another 5 weeks to switch to a new one. Even if you find a good therapist, the turnover is ridiculous and soon enough you get an e mail telling you that your therapist has left and you have to start over again.
cleaned: mental health service time consume difficult find week therapist twice week switch new find good therapist turnover ridiculous soon email tell therapist leave start
